"Luster Class Aptitude Test I":
"This is a test to judge whether an ARKS
is suitable for the Luster class. This will
allow you to bypass the ability restriction.
By achieving the stated objective, even
further improvement is possible.

※Defeat Lv.21~ enemies with a Gunslash
as a Luster only.
※Luster's level cap increases to 55."

"Luster Level Cap License I~II
+5 Luster Skill Points"
